list-item.p: Flower color white; calyx 5-parted; outer and inner corolla surface with papillose knobby cells; style linear, indistinct; stigma asterisk-tuberculate …………………….. L. erythrorhizon
Flower color purple or yellow; calyx 5-lobed; outer corolla surface with tabular rugose and inner corolla with papillose conical cells; style filiform, distinct; stigma tuberculate ….2

Flower color purple; both outer calyx and outer corolla surfaces pubescent with smooth glandular and non-glandular trichomes; inner corolla surface glabrous; stigma globose ………………………………………………………… A. euchroma

Flower color yellow; both outer calyx and outer corolla surfaces pubescent with verrucate non-glandular trichomes; inner corolla surface pubescent with smooth glandular trichomes with stalk; stigma not-globose ………. 3
